title: Server connection problems
body:
Started about 30min-hour ago; got into champ select for a ranked game, timer reached 0 for a teammate, was stuck on that for the longest time, and got disconnected from PvP etc. Lost LP. I restarted client, waited, tried again, happened again. Lost LP. I reinstalled League, tried to go in a custom game, tried to select a champ, and I get the Unknown Error message. I try to access the store, crafting, and I get the same thing. My internet has no problems, no lag, no ping spikes, media streaming is perfectly fine.

This happened today after updating for the patch - anyone experience the same thing?

replies.body:
Based on what you've said, it seems like you may not be able to consistently connect to the servers, even though you're able to connect to the internet in general.

The most helpful thing here would be to run through our [Connection Troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as these are the most likely solutions for connection issues with our server.
